attributes.action: Allow the People £200,000 to Quit Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people for some reason or another
don't have enough funds to Quit Britain.

They feel they are held here as poverty
prisoners.

In order that those accepting the funds
do not do so for merely finacial gain, they will not be allowed to live in Britain again.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
